title: Group Tests
content:
Some cards call for a group test. These tests represent more daunting tasks that require the Rangers to work together. These tests typically have difficulty values that scale based on how many Rangers are in the game.

Group tests work like regular tests, except any Ranger can contribute effort to this test via energy and approach icons. At least one energy must be committed to the test, but it can be from any Ranger. If no other Ranger decides to commit energy, the active Ranger must commit one. Only one challenge card is drawn for the test.

When resolving challenge effects, the Ranger that drew the path moment resolves each effect in the surroundings and along the way. Then, each Ranger who committed effort to the test resolves challenge effects within reach. During this process, all cards within reach of a Ranger who committed effort are considered active.
